title: Student bias
context: B. Accountability [§302A-1001] Student bias. No person in the State, on the basis of sex, shall be excluded from participation in, be denied the benefits of, or be subjected to discrimination under any educational or recreational program or activity receiving state or county financial assistance or utilizing state or county facilities. [L 1996, c 89, pt of §2] Cross References Gender equity in sports, see §§302A-461 to 467.
